    Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

    Klassen
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    Calculator
    The Calculator class provides basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
    InputHandler
    The InputHandler class manages user input and validates numerical and operator inputs for the calculator.
    Main
    The Main class serves as the entry point for the Simple Calculator program.
